‚ÄòFunding black hole‚Äô: councils grapple with ‚Äòcatastrophic‚Äô debt for SEN children https://t.co/O9iprAvEOI @guardian article focussed on managing finances, not on how to help children and their families who are already in a very bad place - shame that this is completely missed.

What would have been better:
- Make sure communication within the team is clear, potential issues raised by family members are picked up by senior person and explored further
- Listen to family members and their concerns & advice
- Check that your suggested approach is right.

What were the consequences:
- Delay and waste of resources
- Child experiencing high level of anxiety and distress
- Parent stressed and unhappy, leaving with poor experience

Another lived experience today:
In a busy regional hospital trust communication between team members did not happen, expert parent was not taken seriously and not listened to at first, only when the routine stuff failed and anaesthetic was at risk did they listen.
